children.name: Beijing Feishu Technology Co., Ltd. and its affiliates (collectively, “we” or “Feishu”), as carriers of Feishu products and services, are well aware of the importance of personal information to you, so we will protect your personal information and privacy in accordance with laws and regulations. We have formulated this privacy policy (“Privacy Policy”) and would like to remind you the following contents for your choices.

• This Privacy Policy specifies how we process your personal information in various scenarios. To help you understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in a more straightforward and concise way, we also provide you with a Concise Version of Feishu Privacy Policy, which forms a part of this Privacy Policy. ​

This Privacy Policy specifies how we process your personal information in various scenarios. To help you understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in a more straightforward and concise way, we also provide you with a
Concise Version of Feishu Privacy Policy
Concise Version of Feishu Privacy Policy
, which forms a part of this Privacy Policy.

• When you turn on relevant features, use relevant services or there is a need to meet the requirements arising from Customer’s management, we will collect relevant information necessary for such purposes. Unless such information is necessary to realize product features or meet the requirements arising from Customer‘s management or required by laws and regulations, you may refuse to provide such with us and your refusal would not affect other features or services. Feishu Personal Information Collection List​

When you turn on relevant features, use relevant services or there is a need to meet the requirements arising from Customer’s management, we will collect relevant information necessary for such purposes. Unless such information is necessary to realize product features or meet the requirements arising from Customer‘s management or required by laws and regulations, you may refuse to provide such with us and your refusal would not affect other features or services.

• Permissions of your address book, precise geolocation, video (camera), microphone, photo album and calendar will not be activated by default, and will only be available for specific features or services with your explicit authorization. You may also withdraw the authorization. In particular, it should be pointed out that even if we have obtained these sensitive permissions with your authorization, we will not collect such information when it is not needed for the relevant features or services. Request for Application Permission and Usage Description​

will not be activated by default, and will only be available for specific features or services with your explicit authorization. You may also withdraw the authorization.

Request for Application Permission and Usage Description

• This Privacy Policy applies to Feishu products and services, including Feishu’s each version of client applications, mini programs, official websites, Feishu software development kit (SDK) and application programming interface (API) for third-party websites and applications and all other products and services provided by us and to which this Privacy Policy applies (collectively referred to as the “Service” or “Feishu” in this Privacy Policy). This Privacy Policy does not apply to other services provided for you by third parties. You should fully understand the product features and privacy protection policies of third-party services before choosing to use them, and then determine whether to use the corresponding features or services. ​

This Privacy Policy applies to Feishu products and services, including Feishu’s each version of client applications, mini programs, official websites, Feishu software development kit (SDK) and application programming interface (API) for third-party websites and applications and all other products and services provided by us and to which this Privacy Policy applies (collectively referred to as the “Service” or “Feishu” in this Privacy Policy). This Privacy Policy does not apply to other services provided for you by third parties. You should fully understand the product features and privacy protection policies of third-party services before choosing to use them, and then determine whether to use the corresponding features or services.

• In addition to this Privacy Policy, in certain scenarios, we will also explain to you, through instant notification (including pop-up window, on-page alerts, etc.) and function update instructions, the purpose, scope and usage of such information collection. These instant notifications and function update instructions constitute a part of this Privacy Policy and have the same effect as this Privacy Policy.​

In addition to this Privacy Policy, in certain scenarios, we will also explain to you, through instant notification (including pop-up window, on-page alerts, etc.) and function update instructions, the purpose, scope and usage of such information collection. These instant notifications and function update instructions constitute a part of this Privacy Policy and have the same effect as this Privacy Policy.
• The relevant parties under the Service are defined as follows: ​
The relevant parties under the Service are defined as follows:

• “Customer” refers to a legal person or other organizations that register an account under the Service through an authorized natural person, establish an organizational structure and have management authority. Customers can invite individuals to join their organizations and become their Authorized Users. ​

“Customer” refers to a legal person or other organizations that register an account under the Service through an authorized natural person, establish an organizational structure and have management authority. Customers can invite individuals to join their organizations and become their Authorized Users.

• “Authorized User” refers to a natural person authorized or invited by a Customer to join the organizational structure established by the Customer in Feishu and to use the Service, including team founders and administrators. Among them, the natural person designated by a Customer to configure the Service and exercise back-stage management authority on behalf of the Customer is the “Administrator” (for the avoidance of any doubts, in this Privacy Policy it is called “Customer Administrator”) , while the natural person who initially created the team on behalf of the Customer is the “Team Founder”. ​

“Authorized User” refers to a natural person authorized or invited by a Customer to join the organizational structure established by the Customer in Feishu and to use the Service, including team founders and administrators. Among them, the natural person designated by a Customer to configure the Service and exercise back-stage management authority on behalf of the Customer is the “Administrator” (for the avoidance of any doubts, in this Privacy Policy it is called “Customer Administrator”) , while the natural person who initially created the team on behalf of the Customer is the “Team Founder”.

• “Individual User” refers to a natural person who registers an account and uses the Service as an individual by contrast with Authorized Users. Individual Users and Authorized Users are collectively referred to as “you”. ​

“Individual User” refers to a natural person who registers an account and uses the Service as an individual by contrast with Authorized Users. Individual Users and Authorized Users are collectively referred to as “you”.

The following contents will help you learn more about how we collect, use, store, transfer (if applicable) and protect your personal information, and help you understand the way to query, re-produce, delete, correct, and withdraw the authorization of personal information. This Privacy Policy is closely related to your use of our Service. We suggest you carefully read and understand all the contents of this Privacy Policy and make the appropriate choices. Among them,
we have already indicated the important contents about your personal information rights and interests in bold. Please pay more attention to these contents.
1.How the Service Collects and Use Personal Information
2.How We Use Cookies and Similar Technologies
3.Other Parties in Data Use, Transfer and Disclosure of Personal Information
5.How We Protect the Security of Personal Information
8.Amendments and Notices of the Privacy Policy
1. How the Service Collects and Use Personal Information ​
How the Service Collects and Use Personal Information

In order to provide the Service for you and every Customer, meet Customer’s needs of working collaboration and management, maintain the normal and safe operation of the Service, and optimize the functional experience of the Service, Feishu will collect the personal information you provide or authorize any other party to provide when registering an account and using the Service, as well as that generated during your use of the Service, according to the following purposes and methods:

a. To use the Service, you need to create a Feishu account. You can create a personal identity account or an organizational identity account (both referred to as “Feishu Account”) by creating a personal identity, creating an enterprise, an organization or joining an organization, and consolidate the same or different login credentials into the Feishu Account. Joining different organizations will generate different Feishu Account.
b. You need to create a Feishu Account through your

. The collection of Mobile phone number is required by relevant national laws and regulations of cyberspace real name regime. If you do not provide mobile phone number for the registration and login, we may not be able to provide you with the Service. You can use your email address bonded with your Feishu Account as login credentials. If you only browse the official website of Feishu, you do not need to register a Feishu Account and provide the above information.

c. If you are an Authorized User, you may join the organization through the invitation code, invitation link or QR code sent by the Customer. Please be aware that the Customer may have provided your mobile phone number to Feishu when sending the invitation to you. However, your account identity under the organization will not be activated unless you confirm the invitation and log in your account identity under the organization. If you voluntarily apply to join an organization, when your application is approved, your account identity under the organization will be created and it will be activated after you log in.

d. When you register an account under the Service on behalf of the Customer, you also need to provide the relevant information such as enterprise/organization name, industry type and staff size. To help you fill in the enterprise information more conveniently, Feishu will help you locate the region of your organization through your IP information, or you can manually select the region. If you want to obtain more features and benefits, you need to provide the basic information on behalf of the Customer, such as the subject certificate, the information related to legal representative or other types of managers and the authorization letter, so that we can help the Customer complete the verification. You should confirm that you have obtained the full authorization of such customers to sign and agree to all the terms in this Privacy Policy.

e. Based on our cooperation with communication carriers, when you use the “one-click login” feature, with your explicit consent, the carriers will send your mobile phone number to us, so that we can provide you with quick login service more easily. The mobile phone number is sensitive personal information. Without it, you will not be able to register for the Service through “one-click login”, but it will not affect you to log in by other methods.

f. If you forget your login password and cannot reset it by yourself, you can use the password reset feature. To ensure the security of your account, you may need to fill in relevant information for verification. When necessary, you may need to verify your identity through the real identity information verification system or other methods.

a. When you activate live broadcasting, retrieve your account or use the features or the relevant services that require identity verification, to comply with relevant laws and regulations, keep the security for you and other users, and maintain the security and stability of features and services, you may need to provide your
real identity information (real name, ID number, phone number, face recognition information etc.)

to complete real-name verification. We may submit the real-name verification information you provide to competent departments or their legally authorized organization to verify the authenticity and accuracy of the information. The aforementioned information contains sensitive personal information, which you may refuse to provide. If you refuse to provide it, you may not be able to receive relevant services, but it will not affect the normal use of other features and services.

b. In the scenario of face recognition, we may use the mobile acceleration sensor to identify the distance and angle between the device and you, to help you complete the recognition quickly and accurately.

c. If your device and Feishu software version support fingerprint or face unlocking function, you may turn on the lock-screen protection function so as to protect the security of account and data based on your needs. When this function is enabled, the Feishu will be automatically locked if it runs from the back end. When it is opened again, it can be unlocked by digits password, or fingerprint or face recognition. The digits password is only stored locally, isolated between different users and will not be transferred to the Feishu server. If you choose the fingerprint or face recognition unlocking method, you only need to complete the information verification on your device. Feishu only receives the verification results without collecting your fingerprint or face information itself. In addition, to improve the security of your account, for the different Feishu Accounts you hold, you may separately set up the lock screen protection, running preference, and unlocking mode for each of them.

a. You may fill in or set up your Profile Photo, alias, personal signature, background image and personal status as you wish. This personal data you voluntarily fill in or set up will be shown to other users. Skipping filling in or setting up such information will not affect your use of Feishu Account and service.

b. If you are an Authorized User, your information displayed on your organization's personal business card page may be set by the Customer Administrator according to the Customer's management needs. Feishu supports the synchronous display of system status as your personal status, such as status of on-leave. So that people cooperating with you can make reasonable work arrangements in real-time communication, meeting reservation and other scenarios. With the permission of the Customer Administrator, you can turn off these features.

1.2.1 In order to realize the transmission and display of information, ensure that new members can view all history messages anytime and anywhere when joining the group, quickly integrate into teams and projects, and improve office efficiency, Feishu will record your
in Feishu and synchronize them to all your logged-in devices.

1.2.2 In case that a user initiates the prompt of an urgent message, in order to promote the quick touch of messages, Feishu will push the urgent SMS or make a phone call to you through the mobile phone number you have provided during your registration, so as to allow other users to remind you to check the information. In order to avoid missing the urgent calls, you can add the urgent number to the address book, for which Feishu will seek the

. If you refuse to provide authorization, you may not be able to store the urgent number, but it will not affect the normal receipt of urgent alerts or the normal use other features under the Service.
1.2.3 When you save your Feishu contacts to your phone address book, Feishu will seek the
1.2.4 If you wish to send your location information to your contacts in the instant messaging interface, Feishu will obtain your
to show you and your contacts where you are.

1.2.5 You can add or delete contacts in Feishu. We will create contact lists and group lists for you. If you are an Authorized User, we will also show you the organizational structure information of the organization you belong to.

1.2.6 If you are an administrator, you can add external contacts through your phone address book. At this time, Feishu will seek the access to the phone’s address book. We need to locally process the names and avatars from the address book in the client for local display purpose only. We will not transmit or store this information back to our server. The email addresses and phone numbers from the address book will be uploaded to the server in the form of hash value for friend matching. However, please rest assured that we have no access to the specific content of this information, and we will not process this information beyond the aforementioned purpose of use. The aforementioned information is sensitive information. Refusal to provide this information will only prevent you from using the above features, but it will not affect your normal use of other features under the Service.
1.2.7 When you send a voice message, use the voice call or the video call, Feishu will seek your permission to
If you send photos and documents, Feishu will
seek the use of your album.

The above permissions are necessary for related features. Your refusal to grant Feishu the permissions will affect your use of the relevant features but will not affect your use of other features of Feishu. When you take pictures with the horizontal screen of your mobile phone, to adapt to the status of your device, we may use the acceleration sensor to identify whether the device is in the horizontal screen status. Feishu attaches great importance to users’ experiences. When you have permitted the use of your album and the last media file is in the video format, to help you reduce the time on sending the video, Feishu may help you compress the last video of the album, when you switch to the chat interface. However, in this scenario, the compression will be performed only locally on your client side, the cache file will be stored locally on your client side and deleted after the Feishu application is restarted.

1.2.8 If you choose to send a message in the voice-to-text or voice-and-text form, Feishu will convert your voice content into text in the server to help you send the message according to the language you choose. If you cancel the sending process, the corresponding voice message will be deleted from the server.

1.2.9 To assist you with content correction while sending messages, we will periodically send the content you enter in the input box to the server for error correction recognition. However, the aforementioned message content will not be stored on the server before you send it out.
1.2 10 When you play voice, to help you determine whether to turn on the handset mode, Feishu may need to use the distance sensor.

1.2.11 In the process of instant communication, if you and the other party are not in the same time zone and your local time is between 22:00 p.m. and 08:00 a.m., to help the other party understand your local time, as to reasonably arrange work communication and avoid unnecessary interference, Feishu needs to use your device time zone so as to show the other party your local time.

1.2.12 If you choose to share an invite code, an invitation link or a QR code to invite an external contact, Feishu will retrieve your profile photo, name, title and organization information and only complete the generation of the invite code, link or QR code on the local clipboard of your device. Please note that the aforementioned information will be disclosed when you invite an external contact in the above way.

1.3.1 You can add working status, event reminders and other calendar scheduling information through the calendar feature of Feishu, subscribe to public or colleagues’ schedules status, and send or accept meeting invitations. If you are the controller of a calendar and schedule, you can set your own calendar schedule privacy to be private, public, or public in a specific scope.

1.3.2 When participants are not in the same time zone, Feishu needs to use the time zone information of your device to show your local time, so that the meeting coordinator can arrange the appropriate meeting time.

1.3.3 When you arrange meetings and add meeting rooms with the calendar feature, Feishu will sort the available meeting rooms according to your previous reservations, so as to help you improve the efficiency of meeting room selection.
1.3.4 If you want to synchronize the calendar and schedule in the device to Feishu, you need to grant Feishu the
. Otherwise, Feishu cannot help you complete the information synchronization, but it will not affect your use of other calendar and schedule features of Feishu.
1.4.1 You can choose to create or upload files in the Feishu cloud space, and these files will be stored in Feishu servers.

1.4.2 The cloud document feature allows multiple Users to view and edit documents stored in the cloud space at the same time. In order to make it easier for other co-Users to collaborate and understand the document, document collaborators can check the document creator, collaborator, created time, number of words and total number of characters, number of visitors and number of visits, and total number of likes and comments. When you publish, edit or comment on a document, Feishu will display your name, profile photo and the content by you. You can set up permissions on documents as you need.

1.4.3 Your actions of sharing documents, creating copies, downloading, browsing, and changing permission settings will be recorded and displayed to the document creator. Among such, you can choose to close the feature of recording your access, so that when you access other documents, others will not be able to view your access record. Under this circumstance, you cannot view the access records of other visitors in the documents you create. However, closing the access recording will not prevent your visits from being counted in the number of visitors and the total number of visits. If the Customer Administrator has turned off the access recording feature, you cannot view the access records in the document information.

1.4.4 When you want to fill in the phone number under the phone number field type in the Bitable, other than fill in the phone number manually, you can also fill in the phone number by jumping to the mobile phone address book. Under this circumstance, Feishu will not seek the access to the address book. Feishu will only help you to read and store the name and phone number of the designated contact you manually selected to fill in the form. Feishu will not store other contents of the address book, nor will it use these data for any other purposes.
1.4.5 When you edit the geographic location field in the Bitable and input your location information through real-time location or geographic location, Feishu will seek
and help you to display the current

1.5.1 You can use Feishu Minutes to improve the efficiency of producing meeting minutes. The conference content could be transcribed into text from the recording generated in an audio/video conference or from recording separately uploaded as audio and video files. If the recording is carried out during a Feishu meeting, Feishu Minutes will distinguish each users’ oral contents according to the accounts speaking in the meeting. When being recorded separately, uploaded as audio/video files, or where multi users talking in the same conference, in order to relatively differentiate every speaker’s voice, Feishu Minutes will cluster and group the sounds in the audio/video files in a programmatic way based on voice print features, so as to distinguish each speaker’s speech contents. Each speaker’s account will be held in anonymous.
For the voice print features utilized in this process, please understand:
a. The related voice print features is always anonymous and will not be linked with any identity information;

b. In terms of accuracy, Feishu adopts the “minimum sufficiency” and “proportionality” principles. The voice print features are designed to serve the purpose of relatively differentiating speakers only, and within the restrains of a particular audio/video file; beyond such, the voice print becomes indistinguishable and unidentifiable;

c. In terms of retention time, Feishu adopts the “shortest time” principle, that is, the related voice print is used as the intermediate data, and only in the process of a program processing. Once speaker distinguishing finished, the related voice prints will be automatically deleted. Feishu will not retain or backup of such voice prints.

1.5.2 Please be aware that the above process involves voice prints processing, but if you or the speaker in the audio and video file disagrees with the processing method of the above voice prints features, you can choose not to use the Feishu Minutes to upload audio and video files. This does not affect your use of making basic recordings in audio and video conferences and other features of Feishu Minutes.
is uniformly configured by the Customer Administrator. If the Customer Administrator enables this feature, it becomes applicable for the Customer’s internal audio and video conference.

1.5.4 When the recording function for audio and video conferences is activated, Feishu will store the corresponding recording files and the transcripts of the contents by Feishu Minutes. The meeting host will be the owner of corresponding files, and she or he can choose to share the recording files with participants or other relevant personnel. If you are the meeting host, you should understand your legal responsibilities, including whether you need to obtain the prior consent of the participants. We are not responsible for your use of recording functions and contents. If you are a participant not willing to be recorded, we suggest that you inform the host your dissent of being recorded.
1.5.5 When you use the virtual image feature in a meeting, we will use the

locally on your client side. In this process, unless otherwise specified and with your consent, we will not transmit the information to our server, store the information, use it for any other purpose, or provide it to a third party.

1.5.6 When you use the mobile phone for a video conference, Feishu may need to use the mobile phone distance sensor to control the information screen, so as to help you avoid touching the screen by mistake.

1.6.1 Feishu provides email services and email client services. To provide email services and display contents of the email, Feishu Mail will store the data related to the email you wrote and receive (including the email address of contacts, contents and attachments of the email). In addition, to help you identify and prevent inappropriate contents that may be harmful, we will use our technical capabilities to help you identify possible spam and inappropriate contents. You understand and agree that the corporate mailbox assigned to you by the Customer Administrator is used as the working mailbox to help you communicate with your enterprise. You will not use the corporate mailbox for private purposes.

1.6.2 You can use the Feishu Mail, through email client services, to send, receive and manage emails from third-party email services. In this scenario, your email related data will only be processed on the Feishu Mail’s email client at your end and will not be transmitted to our server.

1.7.1 You can release information through cloud documents, company circle, topic groups, announcements, comments, livestream and other content publishing features and scenarios provided by Feishu, which will show your name, profile photo, published content and information.
1.7.2 When you take or publish pictures, videos, or livestream, according to the features you use, Feishu will seek your permission on the
respectively. If you decline, you will not be able to use the relevant features, but it will not affect your normal use of other features of the Service.
1.7.3 When you click, browse, comment, collect, download, are “liked” or share the content, Feishu will record the above information.

1.7.4 If you use the translation function in cloud documents, instant message, audio and video conference and other features, Feishu will record and identify the corresponding content and help you complete the translation. When using the translation service, please enter only the texts you want to transfer to our server. The transmission of these texts is necessary for us to provide translation service.

1.7.5 Please pay attention that the information you publish may involve your or others’ personal information or even sensitive personal information. For example, you choose to upload contents containing personal information when publishing. Please consider with greater caution before you share or even publicly share relevant information when using our Services.

1.7.6 When you use the digital red packets or activate or purchase applications from us or through Feishu’s open platform, Feishu will obtain your transaction and order information so as to show you relevant records and manage your order.

1.8.1 When you use the search feature, we will collect your search keyword information and log records so as to show you the content of search results and search history. The search keyword information will be stored in your device and the Feishu server at the same time. You can click the search box to view and delete such search history keywords stored in your device and the Feishu server.

1.8.2 For the purpose of helping you quickly search the desired pictures exiting in the earlier Feishu chat, we will process the texts in pictures if such were in a chat in Feishu group through the programmed algorithm. Such a processing is only used to improve the search efficiency and will not be associated with your identity. We will not use the analysis results for any other purpose or provide such results to a third party.

1.9.1 If the Customer turns on the face clock-in or fingerprint clock-in feature, in order to meet the Customer’s attendance management needs and help you complete the attendance clock-in, Feishu needs to use
provided by you voluntarily or use that provided by the Customer, or
recorded by you voluntarily as a comparison reference image, and perform

comparison verification with the reference image when you use the clock-in feature. The aforementioned face and fingerprint information is sensitive information. Refusal to provide this information will only prevent you from using the face clock-in and fingerprint clock-in feature, but it will not affect your normal use of other features under the Service.1.9.2 If the Customer Administrator activates the GPS, WI-FI or Bluetooth clock-in mode, Feishu will obtain your GPS location information. In WI-FI or Bluetooth clock-in mode, Feishu also needs to obtain your WI-FI access point, Bluetooth information respectively to help you clock in. 1.9.3 If the enterprise turns on the anti-cheating function of clock in, Feishu will compare and confirm whether there is cheating software on the device. Feishu will only obtain the results of whether there is such a cheating software, not your software installation list information, nor will it upload your software installation list to the Feishu server.

1.10.1 You acknowledge and agree that your contacts information (e.g., contact number) provided by you will be used by us during the use of the Service. We may send multiple types of notifications to one or more of your contacts for such as user message notification, identity verification, security verification, user experience investigation, etc. In addition, we may also send you messages about our services, features or activities that you may be interested in by SMS or telephone. If you are not willing to receive such information, you can unsubscribe through the subscription cancellation method provided in the message or contact us directly.
1.10.2 You are free to choose whether or not to be engaged in our marketing activities. If you choose to participate, you may need to provide us with your
name, address, contact details, bank account number

and other information. This information contains personal sensitive information, which is necessary for you to receive transfers or gifts. You may refuse to provide this information, but we will not be able to transfer or distribute gifts to you.

1.10.3 If you want to receive push notifications from the client even when Feishu is closed or running in the background, in order to avoid missing any messages, you need to grant Feishu the permission to auto-start.

In order to provide you with desktop widgets with commonly used tools, documents, calendars and other functions, and to enter related function pages more quickly, we will have a short-term startup behavior in the background after you exit the application in the desktop widget scenario. It does not collect your personal information. You can choose whether to use related functions, if you do not wish to invoke this startup behavior.

We are committed to providing you with products and user environment of safety and reliability. Delivering high-quality and reliable services and information is our core goal. For the purpose of maintaining the normal operation of our services, protecting your legitimate interests, and preventing you, other users and the public from losses, we will collect the necessary information.

a. To maintain a safe operation, quality and efficiency of software and services, we will collect the following information from you: hardware model, operating system version number, device identifiers (For Android devices: such as IMEI, AndroidID, OAID, IMSI, ICCID, GAID, MEID. For IOS devices: such as IDFV; Different identifiers may be used, as the case may be, depending on validity period, acquisition methods and whether such can be reset by users), network device hardware address (device MAC address), hardware serial number (SN), IP address, WLAN access point (such as SSID, BSSID), Bluetooth, base station, software version number, network access method, type, status, network quality data, operation, use, service log, device time zone, device name, CPUID, motherboard serial number, hard disk serial number.

b. To prevent malicious programs and maintain the operation quality and efficiency, we will collect the information of the Feishu application you installed (such as version, language, source, etc.), application-in-process, usage and frequency, application crash and performance data.

c. We may use your account information, device information, service logs and other information that our affiliates and partners may seek from you with your authorization or according to law, for the purpose of maintaining the security of accounts and transactions, conducting identity verification, identifying violations, detecting and preventing security incidents. If required by laws, we will also take measures of retaining, analyzing and disposing of such information.

1.13.1 When you share and copy information, we need to visit your clipboard to read the invite code, sharing code, link and other content information contained in it, so as to facilitate features or services such as switching, copying and sharing.

If your organization has enabled the paste protection feature, you may not be able to copy the contents on Feishu and paste to other applications according to the security policy set by the organization. Feishu will give you a notice on the clipboard that the paste cannot be copied, so you will know the reason in time when you cannot paste. However, this is remind you of the reason. Feishu will not obtain your private information.

When using the Service, you can give feedback on the problems encountered in the process of using the service and your user experience, so as to help us better understand your experience and needs of using our products or services. When solving your problems, it will help us improve our products and services. Therefore, we will record your contact information, feedback problems or suggestions, your communication/call records with us and related contents (including account information, work order information, other information you provide to prove relevant facts, or other contact information you leave), so that we can further contact you and give you feedback on our processing progress.
1.15 Change of Purpose of Collecting and Using Personal Information

Please understand that as our business develops, the features and Service of Feishu may be adjusted and changed. In principle, when the new features or Service is related to such currently in use, the personal information collection and usage remains the same as the original purposes. However, in a scenario that is not directly or reasonably related to the original processing purpose, you will be informed again in a reasonable way such as in-page prompt, interactive process, and agreement confirmation in accordance with the laws, regulations, and national standards, and we will obtain your consent accordingly.
1.16 Exceptions from the Consent Based Collection and Usage of Your Personal Information
Please understand that in the following cases, in accordance with laws and regulations and relevant national standards, we do not need your authorization to collect and use your personal information:
a. When it is related to our obligations as required by laws and regulations;
b. When it is directly related to national security and national defense security;
c. When it is directly related to public safety, public health and major public interests;
d. When it is directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial and execution of sentences;

e. When it is to be used to protect the lives, property and other major legitimate rights and interests of personal information subjects or other individuals, but it is hard to get the individuals’ consent;
f. When your personal information collected is voluntarily disclosed to the public by yourself;
g. When your personal information is collected from the legally and publicly disclosed information, such as legitimate news reports, governmental public information and other channels;
h. When it is necessary for signing or performing contracts per your requests;
i. When it is necessary for maintaining the safe and stable operation of software and related services, such as finding and handling failures of software and related services;
j. When it is necessary for legitimate news reporting;

k. When it is necessary for academic research institutes to carry out statistical or academic research for public interest, and when providing results of academic research or description, the personal information contained in the results is de-identified;
l. Other circumstances as stipulated by laws and regulations.

1.17.1 If you are an Authorized User, in the process of using the Service, in addition to the information collected through the system and submitted by you voluntarily, in order to make it more convenient for you to use the Service, the Customer will provide us with the personal information needed to enable the features and the Service, including but not limited to your account name, name, corporate email, phone number, work location, job title, rank, organizational relationship and other information, and the Customer will update such information from time to time according to the actual situation. According to the Customer's representation and warranty, before providing us with such personal information of you, the Customer has obtained your explicit authorization in advance and has fully informed you of the purpose, scope and use of your personal information. If you cannot confirm the above, we recommend that you immediately stop accessing or using the Service and confirm the above with the Customer. At the same time, you can also contact us through the contact information provided by this Privacy Policy, and we will cooperate with you to handle the related matters within our capabilities.

1.17.2 If you use the Service as an Authorized User, the data generated by your use of your organization ID account is the data controlled by the Customer. The Customer has the right to collect and process personal information generated from the login and use of organization ID account by the Authorized Users when it is necessary for the conclusion and performance of contracts where the Authorized User acts as a party, or for the implementation of human resources management in accordance with the labor rules and regulations established by law, etc. Feishu will only process the information (“Customer-controlled Data”) according to the Customer's instructions, the agreement between the Customer and us and for the purpose of providing you with relevant services and features. Examples include:

name, Profile Photo, alias, personal slogan, background image title, contact information (e-mail, mobile phone number, etc.), working place, job, rank, organizational structure and relationship information
Audio and video files, chat messages, comments, documents, emails, company circle content, Topics entries and other content information of members in the enterprise
generated during using of the Service;

c. For the daily business management and office safety, Customer may activate products or features such as business management (including but not limited to approval, contract and project management, visitor registration) or personnel management (including but not limited to OKR, clock in, access control, check-in, health management, recruitment, human resources, performance, payroll, reporting, travel) and other products or features . In order to realize the relevant features, you may need to provide your

basic personal information (e.g. contact information, gender, social media account), identity information (e.g. relevant certificates), job information (e.g. department, title, rank), work and education information, salary and bank card information, face photo, facial feature information, original fingerprint image, fingerprint feature value, location, schedule, access control and clock-in records, approval records, health status
and other personal information entered, assigned or requested by the Customer;

d. If a student's school chooses to use the Service, to facilitate the communication between the school and parents and the school's relevant management, the school may upload or ask you to provide your
parent (name, mobile phone number, address), your child's identity and class (grade, class, school section, campus) and other information needed to achieve school affairs management;
when you use the Service or purchase the third-party service of Feishu open platform, so as to show you and facilitate your management of relevant transactions;

f. For the purpose of staff management and network and data security, Customers may collect the version number of your operating system, IP address, network access mode, type, status, device information, network device hardware address (MAC address) and service logs;

g. To make communication and collaboration between members of different organizations more efficient and convenient, Customer may active the associated organization feature. To realize the collaborating capability among the associated organizations, your organization will provide external collaborating organizations with your necessary personal information and data generated during work collaboration, and relevant information may be stored and accessed cross borders according to different collaborating counterparties. If you have questions about relevant contents or claim relevant rights and interests, you understand that you can contact the Customer or the Customer Administrator for handling;
h. Other information submitted and you need to submit for Customers’ organization management and operation, collaborative office or specific team management.

1.17.3 For the Customer-controlled Data, the Customer is responsible for notifying Authorized Users of the purpose, method, and scope of personal information collection. If you have any questions about relevant content or claim related to personal information rights and interests, you acknowledge and agree that you can contact the Customer or the Customer Administrator.

Note: If any information, by itself or in combination with other information, is not sufficient to make you identifiable, then it is not your personal information in the legal sense. Where such information, by itself or in combination with other information, becomes sufficient to make you identifiable, or where certain data, though by itself cannot be connected with any specific person, but combined with other information it make you identifiable, we will treat such information as your personal information. We will therefore protect your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy during its combined use.
2. How We Use Cookies and Similar Technologies ​
We Use Cookies and Similar Technologies

2.1 To improve your experience using the Service, we use Cookies and other similar technologies. When you use the Service, we may send one or more Cookies or anonymous identifiers to your device with relevant technologies, to collect and store your information when your accessing and using the Service. We promise that we will not use Cookies for any purpose other than those stated in this Privacy Policy. We use Cookies and similar technologies mainly to facilitate the following functions or services:

a. To maintain the safe and efficient operation of products and services: we may set Cookies or anonymous identifiers for authentication and security, so that we can confirm whether you securely log into the service, or whether you encounter embezzlement, fraud and other illegal accidents. These technologies will also help us improve service efficiency and upgrade login and response speed;

b. To provide you with better access experience: this type of technology can help you spare the need to repeat the steps and processes of filling in your personal information and entering search content (e.g., record search, form filling).

2.2 Most browsers provide users with the features of clearing cache data, which you can perform such features in the browser settings. If it is cleared, you may not be able to use Cookies-based services or corresponding functions provided by us.
3. Other Cooperative Parties in Data Use, Transfer and Disclosure of Personal Information ​
Other Cooperative Parties in Data Use, Transfer and Disclosure of Personal Information
3.1 Other Cooperative Parties involved in Data Processing

If use of data is involved in the process of cooperation with partners, it must be for legal purposes and in compliance with the legal basis as required by law. If the partner’s use of data no longer conforms to the principle of legality, it should not use your personal data anymore, until it obtains the corresponding legal basis.
b. Principle of Justification, Minimum and Necessity:
the use of data must be for justified purposes and be limited to the necessity for achieving such purposes.
c. Principle of Security and Prudence:

We will prudently evaluate the purpose for which partners use data, conduct a comprehensive assessment of the safety and security capabilities of these partners, and require them to abide by the legal agreement of cooperation. We will conduct strict security monitoring on the software development kits (SDK) and application programming interface (API) with which partners obtain information to protect data security.
Directory of Partners Accessed by Feishu
Directory of Partners Accessed by Feishu

In the scenario of entrusted processing of personal information, we will enter into data processing agreements with the entrusted cooperative parties in accordance with the law and supervise their personal information use activities.

In the scenario of jointly processing personal information, we will enter into relevant agreements with our cooperative parties as required by laws and setting forth respective rights and obligations, which will be in compliance with the laws and with the goal of protecting data security in the process of using relevant personal information.
If the specific features and scenarios involve services provided by our affiliates and third parties, the scope of cooperative parties includes our affiliates and third parties.
3.1.5 Use of Data for Features or Services

a. When you use the products and services in the Feishu open platform or the products and services of other third parties, these products and services may use the relevant system permissions authorized by you, or you may be required to submit personal information according to the features of these products and services. We will provide the necessary information of the service or the products serving you according to your authorization. You can refer to the relevant agreements or Privacy Policies of these products and services, you can also withdraw your authorization for these products and services. If you are an Authorized User, the Customer Administrator may provide some Customer usage data to those service providers so that you will be able to use those products or services.

b. Login, bind with other products: When you log in with a Feishu account on a third-party product or service, or bind a Feishu account with another third-party or related party account, such applications or services will use your name, profile photo, app installation status, device information, the order information for purchasing third-party products and other information as authorized by you.

c. Authentication Service: when you use identity authentication or it is required by related services, you may need to complete real name authentication to verify your identity according to relevant laws, regulations, and security requirements. Your real name,

are required in the process of real name authentication. Some of such information is personal sensitive. Refusing the above usage will make you unable to complete identity authentication, however, it will not affect the normal use of other features of Feishu. This information is used only for the purpose of real name authentication and purposes permitted by laws and regulations. Without your explicit authorization, it will not be used for other purposes.
d. Geolocation Service: When you use geo-location related services, the location service provider (Gaode Map) may use your

and device information through SDK or related technologies to return location results to you. Location information is personal sensitive. Refusal to provide such will only affect the geolocation service feature, however, it will not affect the normal use of other features.
e. Payment Feature: Payment feature is provided to you by a third-party payment entity that cooperates with us. Third-party payment entities may need to use your name,
bank card type and account number, validity period and mobile phone number

. Such information is necessary for the payment feature. Refusal to provide such will prevent you from using this feature, however, it will not affect the normal use of other features. At the same time, based on your payment or purchase behavior, relevant product or service providers need to use your order information so that you can query relevant orders. The Feishu payment feature is provided to you by us and Wuhan Hezhong Yibao Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as “Hezhong Yibao”). When you use the Feishu payment feature, Hezhong Yibao will collect and use your relevant information in accordance with laws, regulations, and regulatory provisions. You can refer to the Privacy Policy of Hezhong Yibao for a comprehensive understanding.

f. Push Feature: In order to enable the message push feature to the terminal device you are using, terminal equipment manufacturers (Huawei, Xiaomi, OPPO, VIVO, etc.) may use your mobile phone model, version and relevant device information through SDK and other technologies.

g. Customer Service: to deal with your complaints, suggestions and other demands in a timely manner, the customer service provider needs to use your account and relevant information of the events involved to understand, handle and respond to relevant issues in a timely manner.
3.1.6 Help You Participate in Marketing Promotion

When you choose to participate in marketing activities organized by us and our affiliates or third parties, to provide you with consistent services in joint activities, or to send you cash rewards offered by our entrust cooperative parties in time, we and our cooperative parties may need your name, mailing address, contact information and other information. Some information is personal sensitive. Refusal to provide it may affect your participation in related activities, however, it will not affect your use of other features.

As our business develops, we may carry out mergers, acquisitions and asset transfers, and your personal information may be transferred accordingly. In the event of the aforementioned changes, we will continue to protect, or require the successors who receive personal information to continue to protect, your personal information in accordance with laws and regulations in the same or higher security standards required by this Privacy Policy; otherwise, we will ask the successors to re-obtain your authorization and consent.

We will not publicly disclose your information unless we comply with national laws and regulations, based on your active choice or obtain your consent. Our public disclosure of your personal information will adopt security measures that conform to the industry standards.
Legitimate Exemption from the Consent to Provide and Disclose Personal Information

Please understand that in the following circumstances, according to laws, regulations and national standards, we do not need to obtain your authorization and consent for providing and disclosing your personal information to our cooperative parties or third parties:

a. When it is necessary for the execution and performance of the contract to which you are a party, or for the implementation of human resources management in accordance with the labor rules and regulations formulated according to laws, and the collective contract entered into according to laws;
b. When it is necessary for the performance of legal duties or legal obligations;
c. When it is directly related to national security and national defense security;
d. When it is necessary for coping with public health emergencies or protecting the life, health and property safety of natural persons in emergencies;
e. When it is directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial and execution of sentences;
f. Carrying out news reporting, public opinion supervision and other acts for the public interests, and dealing with personal information within a reasonable range;
g. When your personal information has been disclosed to the public by yourself;
h. When the personal information is collected from such has been legally publicized , such as legitimate news reports, governmental public information and other channels;
i.Other circumstances as stipulated by laws and regulations.

In accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations, we store your personal information collected and generated in the course of domestic operation in the territory of the People's Republic of China. At present, we will not transmit your personal information abroad. If your personal information will be transmitted overseas as needed for your enterprise’s work management purpose, we will protect your personal information pursuant to relevant laws and regulations. If you have questions, you can contact the Customer or the Customer Administrator.

4.2.1 During your use of the Service, we will continue to retain your personal information, and the storage period will not exceed the period necessary to provide the service. We will delete or anonymize your personal information in accordance with applicable laws within a reasonable period of time, when any of the following occurs: (i) we stop the Service; (ii) you cancel your account; (iii) you proactively delete your personal information or (iv) the storage of your personal information exceeds the necessary period of time. Except for the following circumstances:

a. Follow the requirements of laws and regulations on information retention (for example, the Network Security Law stipulates that, technical measures shall be taken to monitor and record network operation status and network security events, and relevant network logs shall be retained for no less than six months according to the regulations).
b. The retention needs to be reasonably extended for the purpose of finance, audit, dispute resolution, etc.
c. The Customer, as a personal information processor, has other processing needs on relevant information.

4.2.2 If you are an Authorized User, you know and understand that if you have any questions about our handling of personal information as the entrusted party according to the Customer's instructions or claim the rights and interests of relevant personal information, you should contact the Customer or the Customer Administrator for handling.
How We Protect the Security of Personal Information

5.1 We attach great importance to the security of your personal information. At present, Feishu has passed the registration and assessment of the National Information Security Classified Protection (Level 3), and has been certified with a number of international authoritative certifications related to personal information protection, including ISO 27701 Privacy Information Management System, ISO Code of Practice For Protection Of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) In Public Clouds Acting as PII Processors, SOC 2 (Type II), etc. We have established a high standard personal information protection management system based on applicable laws and regulations and the above standards, and implemented security technical measures to ensure the security and compliance of personal information processing throughout its life cycle to fully protect user privacy. Our network services adopt encryption technologies such as transport layer security protocols to ensure the security of your data during network transmission. You can check the official website of Feishu to learn more about security and compliance.

5.2 We adopt strict data processing authority control to avoid illegal use of data. We use various de-identification and data desensitization methods such as coding and shielding to enhance the security of personal information in use. Meanwhile, we use the widely used encryption technology in the industry to encrypt and store your personal information, and isolate it through data isolation technology. We maintain these technical and organizational measures and will amend them from time to time to improve overall security of our systems.
5.3 Although the above reasonable and effective measures have been taken and the standards required by relevant laws have been complied with, please understand that

due to technical limitations and various malicious means, in the Internet industry, even if we do our best to strengthen security, it is impossible to always ensure 100% security of information. We will try our best to uphold the security of the personal information you provide to us. Please be aware and understand that the system and communication network you use to access our services may have problems due to factors beyond our control. Therefore, we strongly recommend that you take active measures to protect the security of personal information, including but not limited to using complex passwords, changing passwords regularly, and not disclosing personal information such as your account password to others.

5.4 In the event of an incident that threatens network security, we will take appropriate remedial measures in time according to the contingency plan for network security incidents. If your personal information is leaked, illegally compromised or abused due to the damage of our physical facilities or technical protective measures, causing damage to your legitimate rights and interests, we will bear the corresponding responsibilities in strict compliance with the provisions of the law.

5.5 After we become aware that your personal information has been leaked, illegally compromised or abused, we will inform you in time according to the requirements of laws and regulations of: the basic situation and possible impacts of the security incident, the disposal measures we have taken or will take, the suggestions for you to mitigate and reduce risks, and the remedial measures for you, etc. We will inform you by pushing notification. When it is difficult to inform the personal information subjects one by one, we will issue an announcement in a reasonable and effective way. Meanwhile, we will also report the disposition of personal information security incidents as required by the regulatory authorities.

5.6 Once you browse or use other websites, services and content resources, we will not be in a capable position and be directly obligated to protect any personal information submitted by you during the use of third-party products, regardless of whether you log in, browse or use the above software and websites based on the link or guidance of the Service.

We attach great importance to your management of your personal information and try our best to protect your rights to access, copy, correct, supplement, delete, withdraw consent and authorization, delete your account, complain and report, and set privacy functions, so that you can protect your privacy and information security.

Please understand that specific business features and services will require your information to complete. When you withdraw your consent or authorization, we cannot continue providing you with such features and services, nor will we process your personal information. Nevertheless, your decision of withdrawing your consent or authorization will not affect our previous personal information processing based on your earlier authorization.
The management methods provided by us for this purpose, depends on versions or operating systems, may be variable. Please refer to the actual situation.

a. You can switch to the device system settings page directly in the device’s operating system or through “Settings” – “About Feishu” – “System Permissions” in Feishu, and automatically open or close relevant system permissions, change the scope of consent or withdraw your authorization. After withdrawing the authorization, we will no longer collect information related to such permission.
b. Even after you begin using the products and services in the Feishu open platform, you may still withdraw your authorization in these products and services.

c. You can elect whether to receive the system notification sent by the Feishu in the device settings or set the type of system notification you want to receive. You can also elect the scope and form of notification within the app in “Settings” – “Notification”.

a. You can choose whether to allow other users to find you by searching your contact information in “Settings” – “Privacy” – “How to add me”. Only when you actively enable this feature can other users find you in the way you have elected.

b. You can choose whether to allow other users to view your information and add you as a friend in “Settings” – “Privacy” – “How to add me”. It's your decision on how other users may add you as a friend by checking certain kinds of information, or under which circumstances in particular.

c. You can enter “Settings” – “Account Security Center” to check and modify your login mobile number, email address, set and modify your login password. To help you achieve account security management, you can also enter the account security center to check and manage your login devices.
6.2 Your Right to Your Personal Information
a. If you are an Individual User, you can click on the Personal Profile Photo at the upper left corner to check and modify your profile photo, name, alias, and signature.

b. If you are an Authorized User, you can click on the Personal Profile Photo to check your profile photo, name, alias, department, direct supervisor, personnel type, email, work city and other information. Relevant information is allocated by the Customer. If you want to modify some information, you can submit a request for correction to the Administrator.

c. You can click the Profile Photo or enter “Settings” – “Efficiency” – “Status” to add and edit personal status, or cancel the automatic synchronization of status such as on-leave, scheduling and in meeting.
d. Enter the “Contacts” to query, add and delete contacts. If you are an Authorized User and the internal contact of your organization is set by the Customer Administrator, you cannot delete it;
e. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Favorites” to query and delete your favorite content；
f. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Wallet” to query and manage your bank card and query your transaction records. You can also enter payment management to query your payment real name information;

g. During using the Service, you can operate and adjust in the corresponding function interface according to your needs and the specific products and functions provided by us (for example, you can cancel likes or favorites in the document directly)；

h. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Settings” – “Privacy” – “External Display Time Zone” to automatically follow the device time zone in real-time, customize a specific time zone or hide time zones to manage the time displayed during cross time zone instant communication. Such settings will not affect the time of the message visible to you, the time a document created, etc.;
i. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Settings” – “Calendar” to see how to change the calendar time zone；

In particular, we remind you that you may not be able to modify some initial registration information submitted during registration due to security and identity recognition (such as account retrieval service). If you really need to modify such registration information, please contact us according to the contact information specified in this Privacy Policy.

a. If you or other entitled subjects have any claims, requirements, or questions about the exercise of personal information rights conferred by relevant laws and regulations, you can contact us through the online customer service system or send an email to the contact information specified in this Privacy Policy. We will review the problems involved as soon as possible and reply within 15 working days after verifying your user identity.

b. If you are an Authorized User, when you want to copy or export the information processed by your organization as an information processor or claim relevant personal information rights and interests on such information, you understand and agree that you should contact your organization or the Administrator of your organization for their handling.
6.2.3 Control How You are Visible to Others

a. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Settings” – “Privacy” – “How to add me” to choose whether to allow other users to find you by searching your contact information. This setting is turned off by default. Only when you actively turn on this function can other users find you by checking;

b. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Settings” – “Privacy” – “How to add me” to choose whether to allow other users to view your information and add you as a friend. It's up to you to allow other users to add you as a friend by searching certain types of information and through certain connections to you;
c. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Settings” – “Privacy” — “Who can chat with Me” to control which types of users can communicate with you;
d. Enter “Profile Photo” – “Settings” – “Privacy” — “Blocklist” to query and edit your blacklist. Blocked users will not be able to chat or cooperate with you.
For the personal information processed by Customer, if you cannot exercise your rights through the functional interface, you can submit a claim to the Customer Administrator.
6.3.1 If you are an Individual User, you can log in to Feishu client and click “Profile Photo” – “Settings” – “Account Security Center” – “Delete Account” to submit a delete application online.

6.3.2 If you are an Authorized User, you can delete your organization's identity account if you leave your organization, are moved out by a Customer Administrator, or your organization dissolves your team.

6.3.3 If you apply for deletion of your Feishu Account, before such deletion, we will verify your personal identity, security status, device information and other information, and complete your log off after confirming that the wallet of your account has no balance (when you delete your last Feishu Account). You acknowledge and understand that the act of deleting your account is irreversible. After your account is deleted, we will delete the relevant information about you or anonymize it, except otherwise required by laws and regulations, or by the needs of separately processing related Customer-controlled Data. If you have any opinions or you believe your personal information rights may be infringed, or you find clues about personal information rights infringement, you can enter “Profile Photo” – “Contact Us” and contact us through the online customer service interface or through the contact information published in this Privacy Policy. When you use the voice feature in customer service, we will seek microphone permission so that you can contact customer service more conveniently.

If we stop operation, we will stop collecting your personal information in time, notify you one by one or push an announcement, and delete or anonymize your personal information.
